history.proof: intros A B order g l H. induction H. - apply ordered_nil. - simpl. apply ordered_one. - simpl. apply ordered_cons. + apply last. * sfirstorder depth: 3use: ordered_inv_order. * sfirstorder depth: 3use: ordered_inv_order. + apply IHordered.

ctx: intros A B order g l H.
intros A B order g l H.
exceptions.exn: The reference H2 was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros A B order g l H.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: intros A B order g l H.

original: intros A B order g l H. induction H. - apply ordered_nil. - simpl. apply ordered_one. - simpl. apply ordered_cons. + apply ordered_inv_order in H2. apply H2. + apply IHordered. - simpl. apply ordered_cons. + apply ordered_inv_order in H1. apply H1. + apply ordered_skip. * intros. apply ordered_trans_app with (a:=a); auto. * apply IHordered.
